sqlMap.select: select w.materielCode, m.materielName, w.wasNumber, w.wasMoney, w.wasCause from wasMateriel as w,materiel as m where w.materielCode=m.materielCode and w.wasCode=#wasCode#
sqlMap.update: update wasMateriel set wasNumber=#wasNumber#, wasMoney=#wasMoney#, wasCause=#wasCause# where wasCode=#wasCode# and materielCode=#materielCode#
sqlMap.delete: delete WasMateriel WHERE wasCode=#wasCode# and materielCode=#materielCode#
